deleteConfirmationQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete?

cannotAccess.not_shared: You do not have permission to access the data
cannotAccess.not_paid: You do not have enough money to access the data

loginAndRegistration.registrationText: Please enter the following information to create an account.
loginAndRegistration.registrationConfirmationText: In a moment you will receive an email with a link to confirm the registration.
loginAndRegistration.recoverPasswordText: Please enter the following information to recover password.
loginAndRegistration.recoverPasswordSuccessText: we have sent you an email with the link. Follow instructions provided in the link to recover your password.

button.readAndAcceptTerms: I have read and accept the terms and conditions.

claiming.addNetworkInfo:
To add an IoT device to your list, you need to provide a 36-character long unique identifier (UUID).

Use QR-scanner to scan the code printed on your device (e.g. Porcupine) or enter it manually in the field below.

cameraPermission.message: we need your permission to get access to the camera and scan the QR code
cameraPermission.title: your permission to use phone camera is required in order to be able to scan QR code

claiming.manufacturerAsOwnerWarning: the manufacturer of this device has full access. Do you really want to add this device to your account?
claiming.rescanQRCode: QR code scanned, tap to scan again

deviceDiscovery.selectDevice: Select device you want to configure from the list below.
deviceDiscovery.locationPermissionMessage:
Use Location ?

This app wants to change your device settings:

Use Location

permissionError.bluetooth: Bluetooth is required to find nearby devices.
permissionError.location: Location is required to find nearby devices.

progress.negotiateSecurity: negotiating security with the IoT device
progress.getDeviceWifiList: getting wifi list from the device

error.title: WiFi scan failed
error.description: you can close the setup flow and try again.
error.failedConnect: failed to connect to the device.
error.failedNegotiateSecurity: failed to negotiate security with the device.
error.failedNegotiateSecurityTimeout: the device did not send back the security key.
error.failedGetDeviceWifiList: failed to get Wifi list from the device
error.failedGetDeviceWifiListTimeout: failed to get Wifi list from the device(device did not answer)

wifiConfig.title: configure WiFi
wifiConfig.intro: to setup WiFi on your IoT device, please, enter required details below.
wifiConfig.warning5Ghz: Please, keep in mind that WiFi setup may not be supported on 5GHz networks.

progress.waitDeviceConnect: waiting for the IoT device to connect
progress.addNetwork: registering IoT device in the cloud

success.title: your device is set up and added to your list.
success.description: you can now finish the setup and go to device list view.

error.title: WiFi setup failed
error.description: you can close the setup flow and try again.
error.failedRetrieveTimeout: failed to comunicate with the device.
error.failedNotUuid: wrong UUID was received from the device.
error.rejectedManufacturerAsOwner: Device was not registered to your account since you have rejected device data sharing with the manufacturer of the device.
